title: How to Make Money From the Booming Demand for Energy
description:
The demand for energy is booming, so who is best positioned to make money from this trend?

On this episode of the Odd Lots podcast, we speak with Tyler Rosenlicht, a senior vice president at Cohen & Steers. He joins Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway to talk about the principles behind infrastructure investing and whether there is potential for data centers to actually lower our electric bills. (Source: Bloomberg)
